column2:
COVID-19 negative certification not required / not known
From 4 May 2022, all COVID-19 related restrictions relating to entry into the Falkland Islands have been lifted. No proof of vaccination or a negative test result is required for entry. However, airlines may request proof of COVID-19 vaccination or a negative PCR/ Antigen test as a condition for travel. You should check directly with the carrier.
column3:
